summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the operating hours for Parks; adding a new Section SMC 18.12.245 establishing general operating hours for City parks; amending SMC 18.12.040 to authorize the Superintendent to establish specific operating hours for individual parks and facilities; amending SMC 18.12.235 to prohibit parking or leaving a vehicle in a park during hours that the park is not open to the public; and amending SMC 18.12.277, adding to the crime of trespass in the parks the act of being present in a park when the park is not open to the public.
